information: The maximum number of points is 100. Those are the cross-code-review and cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: Conversion of class components to functional components with hooks
Pagination is present in both URL and on the page
User-initiated change of items per page triggers a new request, displaying the first page
Upon clicking, open details panel on the right side of the page
Use router outlet, left side of the page should continue displaying the list of results
Initiate an additional API call, display a loader, and update the URL
Details panel should be closed either on the 'close' button click or on the main panel click
Direct DOM manipulations inside the React components
Presence of code-smells (God-object, chunks of duplicate code), commented code sections
Usage of Redux or other state management libraries
Usage of component libraries, e.g. Material UI, Ant Design
